text.section: The Court of Appeals shall consist of fourteen (14) judges, with two (2) judges from each of seven (7) Court of Appeals districts.
The districts of the Court of Appeals shall correspond in geographical dimensions to the districts of the Supreme Court, as defined in KRS Chapter 21A.

law.history: Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 70, sec. 2, effective March 23, 1976.
